name: Police Emergency Vehicle Car Rush: The New-York Taxi Traffic Jam Madness - Free Edition
name_original: Police Emergency Vehicle Car Rush: The New-York Taxi Traffic Jam Madness - Free Edition
description:
TRY OUR POLICE EMERGENCY VEHICLE CAR RUSH : THE NEW-YORK TAXI TRAFFIC JAM MADNESS GAME

Did you ever dream to drive police car?

In this game, you will drive the police car in the high traffic of New York City while avoiding other cars and obstacles on your way. You have to reach on time to help other people so be quick.

Oh don’t forget to collect as much as coins are possible to unlock all amazing cars.

How to play?

- Control a police car trying to get on place
- Avoid heavy taxi traffic jam
- Collect as much as coins are possible to unlock cool police car

DOWNLOAD TODAY FOR FREE >>>POLICE EMERGENCY VEHICLE CAR RUSH : THE NEW-YORK TAXI TRAFFIC JAM MADNESS GAME

Suggestions are welcome! Please send them to us.
